title: Characterization and biocontrol potential of Wickerhamomyces subpelliculosus yeasts isolated from dates: Volatile compounds-mediated antifungal activity against mycotoxigenic Penicillium strains
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Islem Dammak, Nourelhouda Abdelkefi, Imen Ben Atitallah, Michael Brysch-Herzberg, Abdulrahman H. Alessa, Salma Lasram, Hela Zouari-Mechichi, Tahar Mechichi
